name: CUBES (itch) (ArcherX412)
description:
The game is about avoiding CUBES. You earn money for the time you manage to survive. For money you can buy colorful cubes and powerups. Have fun :)

I dont know own the music used as soundtrack to this game. It can be found there: 

PS. Be aware of sound level !!! It might be too loud. And if you want to delete your save go there : C:\Users\%yourUserName%\AppData\LocalLow\DefaultCompany\Red Cubes\saves 

and delete shop.fun
